intro: Psychotria peekeliana, commonly known as the Peckel's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests. The plant contains various alkaloids, some of which have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
